Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-8932 affecting package php for versions less than 8.3.14-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-8932 affecting package php for versions less than 8.3.14-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package php is earlier than 8.3.14-1, affected by CVE-2024-8932
